snippet.title: Kerbal Space Program 1.2: Loud and Clear - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Kerbal Space Program 1.2: Loud and Clear is here!

Enjoy this cinematic trailer that we prepared for this special ocasion.

Kerbals hit a milestone, they are now interconnected and they can hear you Loud and Clear! Let your imagination fly with new possibilities, build communication networks, control vehicles remotely and explore every inch of the Kerbol System in ways that weren’t possible before with this new update!

Kerbal Space Program 1.2: Loud and Clear  is now available on the KSP Store, Steam and will soon be available on GOG and other third party resellers.

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/
